message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I understand you want a larger share, but consider the inflation.  This offer ensures a fair deal in the long run.
Considering the inflation, my offer is more generous than it seems. Take it before the money devalues further.
This is my final offer.  A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome given the circumstances. I urge you to accept before the money loses more value.
You said 50/50 was your final offer, but I'm willing to compromise. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
